Fantastic news!

Because of the great interest in Game of Thrones: The Exhibition in Amsterdam the doors of the Posthoornkerk (church) will be now open on Thursday, May 23 and Friday, May 24 too. Between 10 and 17 pm visitors will have access to the wonderful world of Westeros! The Iron Throne awaits you... Timeline Photos.

Westeros will come alive for fans in an immersive, not-to-be-missed touring exhibition that will transport viewers into the breathtaking and enchanted world of the 7 Kingdoms. The traveling exhibit, the first of its kind by HBO, will stop in five international cities - Toronto (3/9-3/16), New York City (3/28-4/3), Sao Paolo (4/25-4/30), Amsterdam (5/18-5/27) and Belfast (6/8-6/17). Game of Thrones Exhibition: Props and Costumes.
